org.apache.ctakes.assertion.eval

Class MergeGoldViewFromOneCasIntoInitialViewOfAnotherCas

  • java.lang.Object
    • JCasAnnotator_ImplBase
      • org.apache.ctakes.assertion.eval.MergeGoldViewFromOneCasIntoInitialViewOfAnotherCas

  • public class MergeGoldViewFromOneCasIntoInitialViewOfAnotherCas
extends JCasAnnotator_ImplBase
    Read in gold annotations from XMI and create a view within the current CAS, and copy the gold annotations into the new view within the current CAS. Written to handle testing the cTAKES 2.5 assertion (polarity) value against the gold standard, using XMI that had already been created by the Apache cTAKES 3.0 gold standard reader.
